channel.title: [Hyperion] [pja source] Mute/ipmute command will pay 10m+ rsgp!
channel.description: im currently in need of a ipmute/mute method that works this includes the command and the other stuff to make the command work i will pay 10m + rsgp if someone either links me to a tutorial or helps me them selfs message me via the forums or msn [email]redemption562@hotmail.co.uk[/email]

item.title: [Hyperion] [pja source] Mute/ipmute command will pay 10m+ rsgp!
item.dc:creator: @sombohdi sombohdi
item.description:
@sombohdi wrote:

What you do is you go into signlink.jave and set the dynamic terms for the corrupt lines. Then it will automatically refract the sequence allowing you to make the command. After you done that follow these simple steps to get it working.

Go to commands.java and type "if player & = (“ipban”);
then type "players name = “ingame user.c+”)

I hope this guide helped.

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion] [pja source] Mute/ipmute command will pay 10m+ rsgp!
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

[quote=“xxbanditxx, post:15, topic:405813”]this is the command i got for ipmute on my 525 server

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“ipmute”)) {
try {
String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(7);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
Connection.addIpToMuteList(Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom);
c.sendMessage("You have IP Muted the user: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName);
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
c2.sendMessage(“You have been muted by: " + c.playerName);
c2.sendMessage(” " +c2.playerName+ " Got IpMuted By " + c.playerName+ “.”);
break;
}
}
}

rep me :D?[/quote]
Are you fucking stupid moron?
We are talking about HYPERION - PROJECT ANNIHILATION HERE now some shit 525 you idiot… Learn to fucking read.

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion] [pja source] Mute/ipmute command will pay 10m+ rsgp!
item.dc:creator: @xxbanditxx xxbanditxx
item.description:
@xxbanditxx wrote:

this is the command i got for ipmute on my 525 server

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“ipmute”)) {
try {
String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(7);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
Connection.addIpToMuteList(Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom);
c.sendMessage("You have IP Muted the user: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName);
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
c2.sendMessage(“You have been muted by: " + c.playerName);
c2.sendMessage(” " +c2.playerName+ " Got IpMuted By " + c.playerName+ “.”);
break;
}
}
}

rep me :D?
